newsitem.title: USA: Industrie Natuzzi to raise 1996 dividend.
newsitem.headline: Industrie Natuzzi to raise 1996 dividend.

text.p: Industrie Natuzzi SpA on Wednesday said its board recommended raising its 1996 dividend to 260 lira per ordinary share or American Depositary Share, up from 160 lira in 1995.
Earlier, the company said net earnings in 1996 rose to $1.34 a share from $1.04 the previous year.
